channel.title: Choplogic Radio
channel.description: A weekly independent indie radio show broadcasting out of Bushwick, Brooklyn.
channel.itunes:author: Julio
channel.itunes:subtitle: An independent and progressive radio station founded in East Williamsburg/Bushwick, Brooklyn and now permanently broadcasting out of San Francisco, CA.
channel.itunes:summary: A weekly independent and progressive radio station broadcasting out the OfficeOps Arts and Community Center in East Williamsburg/Bushwick, Brooklyn. The show promotes innovative music of all types, with a special focus on contemporary indie music.

item.title: Choplogic Radio #81
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:summary: "Rings of Saturn" from Tops rewards repeated listening.
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, San Francisco, John Talabot, Dustin Wong, Slapp Happy, Natureboy, Peaking Lights, Killing Joke

item.title: Choplogic Radio #80
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:summary: Hot show this month. New tracks from Spain's own John Talabot, some Slapp Happy from 1974 (featuring Anthony Moore on keyboard), and a whole lot more. War is a new band from Oslo that is adding its own distorted spin on 90s club and house music.
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, San Francisco, John Talabot, Dustin Wong, Slapp Happy, Natureboy, Peaking Lights, Killing Joke

item.title: Choplogic Radio #79
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:summary: Michael Hurley, Fire Engines, post punk, Saint-Preux, Kraus, Ruth, The Offset and more. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, Michael Hurley, Fire Engines, post punk, Saint-Preux, Kraus, Ruth, The Offset

item.title: Choplogic Radio #78
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: hiver
item.itunes:summary: Dirty Beaches, Peaking Lights, Portishead, and more. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, scene, pure x, crinkles, beirut, bushwick, la big vic, swamp donkey, wetdog

item.title: Choplogic Radio #76
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: double up
item.itunes:summary: Kindness, Sbtrkt, Beak>, and more. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, scene, pure x, crinkles, beirut, bushwick, la big vic, swamp donkey, wetdog

item.title: Choplogic Radio #73
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: Warm summer nights mix
item.itunes:summary: Great show this week. New songs from Blood Orange, Part Time, Rifle Recoil and Sbtrkt. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, scene, pure x, crinkles, beirut, bushwick, la big vic, swamp donkey, wetdog

item.title: Choplogic Radio #72
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: Off to Croatia Episode
item.itunes:summary: Great show this week. New songs from Pure X, Crinkles and Beirut. Some great new Brooklyn bands too, like La Big Vick, Swamp Donkey and Boy Friend. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, scene, pure x, crinkles, beirut, bushwick, la big vic, swamp donkey, wetdog

item.title: Choplogic Radio 67.3 (Part 3)
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: Part 3 of 3.
item.itunes:summary: Awesome show featuring Steal A Car by Wetdog, Hots for Teacher by Coasting and a whole lot of other great stuff. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: choplogic, radio, indie, music, rock, brooklyn, julio, new, york, city, east, village, lower, east, side, alternative, hip, hipster, scene, scenester, shins, coasting, bushwick, jonas, reinhardt, wetdog

item.description: My best show yet. Listen to me play some of Sonali's old and (hopefully) new favorites. New music from The Shins, Malajube, Oxy Cottontail, and more! /
item.itunes:author: Julio
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Sonali's Birthday Edition
item.itunes:summary: My best show yet. Listen to me play some of Sonali's old and (hopefully) new favorites. New music from The Shins, Malajube, Oxy Cottontail, and more!

item.itunes:summary: My best show yet. Lots of great music, including the Country Teasers, Pterodactyl, Lightning Bolt, and Japanther!
